com.epam.training.booklibrary.datamodels

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.booklibrary.datamodels.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contains methods for receiving with a DB of data for operation of application

                              int numberCopies,
                              byte[] coverImage)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                              javax.naming.NamingException,
                              MainExceptions.MainErrorException,
                              java.io.IOException
        The method creates the new book in a DB
        Parameters:
        authorID - identifier of the author of the book
        genreID - book genre identifier
        publisherID - identifier of publishing house
        publishYear - year of the edition
        isbn - ISBN code
        name - name of the book
        shortDescription - short description of the book
        numberCopies - number of copies of the book
        coverImage - book cover
        Returns:
        new book (type of Book)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
